text:
Ah...
It smells nice... Maybe from the flower shop?

Hey, Amana-chan, if you were to receive a present,
what kind of flowers would make you happy?

Eh?! I wonder what would be good...
Hmm... There are so many, I can't decide~!

Hehe, yeah, that's true.
Each flower has its own unique charm.

Okay, here's another question. Is there something you'd
like them to do when choosing the flowers for you?

For example... Looking up your favorite
color or the meaning of the flowers...
If they did something like that, hmm...

A memory just between Amana and Chiyuki-san...
I'd be happy to feel that.
